column2: So God created mankind in his own image
column3: So God created mankind in his own image, in the image of God he created them; male and female he created them.
“Keep my commands and follow them. I am the Lord.”
Love the Lord your God with all your heart and with all your soul and with all your strength.
Give priase to the Lord, proclaim his name; make known among the nations what he has done.
“Listen to this, Job; stop and consider God’s wonders.”

column2: May the words of my mouth
column3: May the words of my mouth and this meditation of my heart be pleasing in your sight, Lord, my Rock and my Redeemer.
Hear my prayer, O God; listen to the words of my mouth.

column2: The Lord is good to all
column3: The Lord is good to all; he has compassion on all he has made.
Listen to my instruction and be wise; do not disregard it.
Even small children are known by their actions, so is their conduct really pure and upright?

column2: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good.
column3: He has shown you, O mortal, what is good. And what does the LORD require of you? To act justly and to love mercy and to walk humbly with your God.

column2: But I tell you, love your enemies
column3: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.
If you believe, you will receive whatever you ask for in prayer.
Heaven and earth will pass away, but my words will never pass away.

column2: Do to others as you would
column3: Do to others as you would have them do to you.
Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.
Greater love has no one than this: to lay down one’s life for one’s friends.
But you will receive power when the Holy Spirit comes on you; and you will be my witnesses in Jerusalem, and in all Judea and Samaria, and to the ends of the earth.
So then, each of us will give an account of ourselves to God.
So whether you eat or drink or whatever you do, do it all for the glory of God.
But everything should be done in a fitting and orderly way.
Children, obey your parents in the Lord, for this is right.
I can do all this through him who gives me strength.

column3: My dear brothers and sisters, take note of this: Everyone should be quick to listen, slow to speak and slow to become angry.
We love because he first loved us.
